## CMSSW_7_4_X release cycle

* Last report we gave was about pre5: since then we reached pre8 and opened 75X

### CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6

Changes since CMSSW_7_4_0_pre5: [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_4_0_pre5...CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6)

1. [7285](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7285) from @arizzi: Introduce better PV sorting [[Talk@RecoMeeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/364004/session/5/contribution/2/material/slides/0.pdf)]
1. [6623](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6623)  from @BenjaminRS: Update CkfTrajectoryBuilder to handle hitless seeds.
1. [7218](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7218)  from @VinInn: demote to Warning TrackNaN as the quality of the event is not affected
1. [7110](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7110)  from @mtosi: add new strip dQdx MEs [[Talk from Bill Ford](https://indico.cern.ch/event/342236/session/5/contribution/10/material/slides/0.pdf)]

## CMSSW_7_4_X release cycle

### CMSSW_7_4_0_pre7

Changes since CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6: [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6...CMSSW_7_4_0_pre7)

1. [7557](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7557)  from @makortel: Fix MultiTrackValidator example configuration
1. [7541](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7541)  from @trocino: Clean up cosmic mu reco in pp
1. [7521](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7521)  from @rovere: Add DontCountDetsAboveNClusters to standard cosmic seeders
1. [7505](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7505)  from @lviliani: Geant4e integration in 7_4_X
1. [7526](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7526)  from @suchandradutta: Tk data vs MC validation tool
1. [7474](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7474)  from @rovere: Fix get by labels

## CMSSW_7_4_X release cycle

### CMSSW_7_4_0_pre8

Changes since CMSSW_7_4_0_pre7: [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_4_0_pre7...CMSSW_7_4_0_pre8)

1. [7937](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7937)  from @mdhildreth: 74 x pixel dynamic eff in pre mixing
1. [7894](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7894)  from @wmtford: Remove occupancy-based flagging of merged clusters
1. [7756](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/7756)  from @makortel: Fixes to primary vertex validation

### CMSSW_7_5_X release cycle

[Schedule](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/CMSSW_7_5_0)

* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre1: 9 March 2015
* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre2: 30 March 2015
* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre3: 13 April 2015
* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4: 27 April 2015
* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre5: 11 May 2015 (Last open release)
* CMSSW_7_5_0_pre6: 25 May 2015 (Bug fix release as needed
* CMSSW_7_5_0: 8 June 2015

## Announcements

* Offline Beamspot is currently covered by the Milano Bicocca Group:
    * a huge thanks to them for their involvement
    * knowledge transfer is already in progress between them and Kevin
      Burkett, to whom we give our big thank for the incredible work
      he did in the past N years.

* There is a very interesting talk opportunity at CHEP related to Tracking:

   * Link into
     [CINCO](https://cms-mgt-conferences.web.cern.ch/cms-mgt-conferences/conferences/pres_display.aspx?cid=1514&pid=10418)

   * Title: "CMS reconstruction improvements for the tracking in large pile-up events"

   * Please nominate yourself if you feel like giving this talk, but
     hurry up, the deadline is quickly approaching: March 15th.
